page.title: 08SOUTH NORMANTON 3.30-6.00pm.
page.content: At 3.30 pm. we go home from school.We go in the house,get changed and go and call for our friends.We see if they are coming out and if they aren't in then we go back home and watch cartoons on the television for a while. Usually after a hard day of work at school we get something to eat or drink and relax and watch T.V. a little longer. Later we call for our friends again. Mostly they are in by now and so we go and play at cricket or go for a bike ride. When we arrive back home we play games on our computers.There are many computer games to play. These include: Ghostbusters,Invaders,Leapfrog and Penetrator but our favourite game is Manic Miner.In this game you have to collect golden keys to open the door to get out of the room,there are 20 rooms to complete which are very hard.
